channel.title: Office on Julien Pivotto
channel.description: Recent content in Office on Julien Pivotto

item.title: The LibreOffice Calc 1024 columns bug
item.description: Sometimes it is sad to see some quite important bugs that last in time. One of the last one I hit is a limitation in LibreOffice Calc. It does not support calc spreadsheet with more that 1024 columns. That bug was already opened in 2008 in OpenOffice. It is really a blocker bug for people that receive spreadsheets that have a lof of columns. For example I have seen a spreadsheet with one column per day.
